quotes.quote: Great deeds are usually wrought at great risks.
Big words seldom accompany good deeds.
Good deeds are seldom remembered; bad deeds are seldom forgotten.
The good deed you do today, for a brother or sister in need will come back to you some day, for humanity's a circle in deed.
Good deeds from good intentions flow; but good intentions only; build for us a place below.
Every time you do a good deed you shine the light a little farther into the dark. And the thing is, when you're gone that light is going to keep shining on, pushing the shadows back.
When you are kind to others, it not only changes you, it changes the world.
Thinking good thoughts is not enough, doing good deeds is not enough, seeing others follow your good examples is enough.
A good deed hidden in silence dies.
Seek to do good, and you will find that happiness will run after you.
There is a sort of gratification in doing good which makes us rejoice in ourselves.
If you do one good deed, your reward is to be set to do another and harder and better one.
A good deed is like peeing in your pants. Everyone knows you did it, but only you can feel it's warmth.
The smallest good deed is better than the grandest intention.
Men do not value a good deed unless it brings a reward.
Good deeds are no less good because their object is unworthy.
According to the Sutras, evil deeds result in hardships and good deeds result in blessings.
It takes many good deeds to build a good reputation, and only one bad one to lose it.
Good deeds should be done with intention, not for attention.
It's much better to do good in a way that no one knows anything about it.
Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
To be doing good deeds is man's most glorious task.
Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
The nicest feeling in the world is to do a good deed anonymously-and have somebody find out.
If we have the opportunity to be generous with our hearts, we have no idea of the depth and breadth of love's reach.
How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world.
A good deed is never lost. He who sows courtesy, reaps friendship; he who plants kindness, gathers love; pleasure bestowed on a grateful mind was never sterile, but generally gratitude begets reward.
It is part of a good man to do great and noble deeds, though he risk everything.
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
Our deeds still travel with us from afar, and what we have been makes us what we are.
Good deeds are seeds of generosity.
Good actions ennoble us, and we are the sons of our deeds.
Anyone who proposes to do good must not expect people to roll stones out of his way, but must accept his lot calmly, even if they roll a few stones upon it.
You dont see its growth. But, it does by days. Doing the wicked deeds is like the hone. You dont see its damage. But, it does by days.
Even though your time on the job is temporary, if you do a good enough job, your work there will last forever.
The best deed of a great man is to forgive and forget.
Know you not that a good man does nothing for appearance sake, but for the sake of having done right?
Our worth is determined by the good deed we do, rather than by the fine emotions we feel.
Better do a good deed near at home than go far away to burn incense.
Talking isn't doing. It is a kind of good deed to say well; and yet words are not deeds.
Wherever there is a human in need, there is an opportunity for kindness and to make a difference.
That best portion of a good man’s life; His little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
This is what my soul is telling me: Be peaceful and love everyone.
Better a good deed that is boasted than no good deed at all.
Good deeds are the best prayer.
Good deeds may not be rewarded; even good firewood may ruin the stove.
The smallest good deed is better than the grandest good intention.
Good deeds return to the house of their author.
Do good to thy friend to keep him, to thy enemy to gain him.
Deeds are love and not fine phrases.
Each small task of everyday life is part of the total harmony of the universe.
A life spent worthily should be measured by deeds, not years.
Neither fire nor wind, birth nor death can erase our good deeds.
A man makes no noise over a good deed, but passes on to another as a vine to bear grapes again in season.
It is not enough to do good; one must do it in a good way.
He who is too busy doing good finds no time to be good.
You can fake being cool, but you can't fake being good.
A good edge is good for nothing, if it has nothing to cut.
The profit of a good action is to have done it.
Do good by stealth, and blush to find it fame.
To be good is noble, but to teach others how to be good is nobler - and less trouble.
There is an idea abroad among moral people that they should make their neighbours good. One person I have to make good: myself.
Good words make us laugh; good deeds make us silent.
One good deed is better than three days of fasting at a shrine.
